hero.title: Nanofiber Technology is the Future

hero.description: Our internationally patented technology leads the next generation of high-performance hygiene and medical materials.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We are committed to enriching the body, mind and soul of all mankind through the development of high quality medical devices and personal health care products.

values.title: At NASK
values.subtitle: We have strong belief in 3 core values

value1.title: Customer Excellence
value1.description: Serve our customers and meet market demands with innovative and high quality products and services through continuous improvement

value2.title: Brand Leadership
value2.description: Strive for excellence in our products and services so that our brand becomes the first choice of customers

value3.title: Global Standards
value3.description: Ensure our products will fully comply with international safety and quality standards and contribute to the wellness of all mankind, the environment and the society

about.title: About NASK Nanofiber Technology
about.description: NASK's patented nanofiber technology represents a breakthrough in advanced material science, delivering a new generation of high-performance nonwoven solutions. Our nanofiber-enhanced substrates are engineered to surpass traditional materials by providing superior fluid management, exceptional breathability, enhanced antimicrobial functionality, and reliable long-term stability across diverse applications.
about.applications: Used in diapers, sanitary pads, medical respirators, and functional textiles, NASK nanofibers are produced using precise electrospinning processes developed and patented across China, the United States, Japan, Europe, and Hong Kong.

validation.title: Scientific & Laboratory Validation
validation.subtitle: All nanofiber top sheets have undergone testing by accredited laboratories
